bibliographic-data.invention-title: Money transfer notification systems and methods

nplcit.text: Internet Cash Management Takes Off. Brian O'Connell. Bank Technology News, Jan 2000. Vol 13, No. 1
Making International Payments -- Navigating the Course. Michael Burn. AFP Exchange, Winter 2000. Vol 20, Issue 1. pg. 62
E-banking provider creates 'financial hub'. Kenneth Kiesnoski. Bank Systems & Technology, Jan 2000. Vol 37, Issue 1

abstract.p: A method of transferring funds from a sender to a recipient includes receiving, at a transfer location, a transfer request from the sender. The transfer request includes a notification request to notify the sender when the recipient receives the funds. The method also includes sending the transfer request to a host computer system, receiving, at a transfer location, a request from the recipient to receive the funds, receiving a message at the host computer system that the recipient received the funds, and sending from the host computer system a notification to the sender that the recipient received the funds.

PROCEDE ET SYSTEME DE NOTIFICATION DE TRANSFERT D'ARGENT
SYSTEM AND METHODS FOR DISCLOSING TRANSACTION INFORMATION TO CUSTOMERS.
SISTEMA Y METODOS PARA DESCUBRIR INFORMACION DE TRANSACCION A LOS CLIENTES.

abstract.p: A method of disclosing transaction information to customers includes receivingat a host computer system a file comprising processing information. The processinginformation comprises a plurality of transaction categories and fee informationassociated with each transaction category. The method also includes receivinga message from a point-of-sale device requesting the fee information associatedwith at least one particular transaction category relating to a transactionwith a customer and sending from the host computer system an electronic messagecomprising the fee information. The method further comprises displaying transactioninformation relating to the electronic message at the point-of-sale deviceand providing the customer the opportunity to cancel the transaction. The transactionmay involve an exchange between at least two different forms of value.

Un metodo para descubrir informacion de transaccion a los clientes incluye el recibir en un sistema de computadora anfitrion un expediente que comprende informacion de procesamiento. La informacion de procesamiento comprende una pluralidad de categorias de transaccion e informacion de honorarios asociada con cada categoria de transaccion. El metodo tambien incluye el recibir un mensaje desde un dispositivo de punto de venta pidiendo la informacion de honorarios asociada con por lo menos una categoria de transaccion particular en relacion a una transaccion con un cliente y enviando desde el sistema de computadora anfitrion un mensaje electronico que comprende la informacion de honorarios.

El metodo ademas comprende el recibir la informacion de transaccion en relacion al mensaje electronico en el dispositivo de punto de venta y proporcionar al cliente la oportunidad de cancelar la transaccion. La transaccion puede involucrar un intercambio entre por lo menos dos formas de valor diferentes.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: MONEY TRANSFER NOTIFICATION SYSTEMS AND METHODS.
SISTEMAS Y METODOS DE NOTIFICACION DE TRANSFERENCIA DE DINERO.

abstract.p: A method of transferring funds from a sender to a recipient includes receiving, at a transfer location, a transfer request from the sender. The transfer request includes a notification request to notify the sender when the recipient receives the funds. The method also includes sending the transfer request to a host computer system, receiving, at a transfer location, a request from the recipient to receive the funds, receiving a message at the host computer system that the recipient received the funds, and sending from the host computer system a notification to the sender that the recipient received the funds.

Un metodo para transferir fondos desde un remitente a un receptor incluye el recibir, en un lugar de transferencia, una peticion de transferencia desde el remitente. La peticion de transferencia incluye una peticion de notificacion para notificar al remitente cuando el receptor recibe los fondos. El metodo tambien incluye el enviar la peticion de transferencia a un sistema de computadora anfitrion, recibiendo, en el lugar de transferencia, una peticion de que el receptor recibe los fondos, recibiendo un mensaje en el sistema de computadora anfitrion de que el receptor recibio los fondos, y enviar desde el sistema de computadora anfitrion una notificacion al remitente de que el receptor ha recibido los fondos.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: System and methods for disclosing transaction information to customers

nplcit.text: Minami et al. (US 2002/0153415), International online automatic cash transaction system, Oct. 24, 2002.*
Barbara et al. (US 2002/0016769), Method and system for online payments, Feb. 7, 2002

abstract.p: A method of disclosing transaction information to customers includes receiving at a host computer system a file comprising processing information. The processing information comprises a plurality of transaction categories and fee information associated with each transaction category. The method also includes receiving a message from a point-of-sale device requesting the fee information associated with at least one particular transaction category relating to a transaction with a customer and sending from the host computer system an electronic message comprising the fee information. The method further comprises displaying transaction information relating to the electronic message at the point-of-sale device and providing the customer the opportunity to cancel the transaction. The transaction may involve an exchange between at least two different forms of value.

The transaction may involve an exchange between at least two different forms of value.

The transfer request includes a notification request to notify the sender when the recipient receives the funds. The method also includes sending the transfer request to a host computer system, receiving, at a transfer location, a request from the recipient to receive the funds, receiving a message at the host computer system that the recipient received the funds, and sending from the host computer system a notification to the sender that the recipient received the funds.
